divs: Sighting Detailsi work security in downtown cleveland and i went outside to do my rounds and i looked up at the building and above the building and there were lights spining and then they stoped.i got pics of it this thing was triangle with 6 lights on it.so i called housekeeping down to see it and they ran back inside of the building.so then it took off and at 6:45am it was up there for about 20min.that whole night felt weird and my radio was making weird noises.thats my story what do u thank?
Summary: lights over my building downtown cleveland it had a haze with lights and took off very fast
